amendment.description: An amendment numbered 14 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to prohibit compensation for lobbying contacts on behalf of foreign countries identified by the Secretary of State as engaging in a consistent pattern of gross violations of internationally recognized human rights.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jayapal amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A013) offered by Ms. Jayapal.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jayapal amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
